h2_title: The Great Sage's Broken Shell Boss Fight and Guide
h3_title: The Great Sage's Broken Shell Phase Two
content: Each one will land inside the Destined One as the Great Sage crumbles, and his crown lands in the water. As the Old Monkey appears again, he'll place the crown upon the Destined One's head and finish the tale of Sun Wukong.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Great_Sage's_Broken_Shell.md', within the main section titled 'The Great Sage's Broken Shell', specifically from the subsection 'The Great Sage's Broken Shell Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'The Great Sage's Broken Shell Phase Two'.
The content is as follows:
Each one will land inside the Destined One as the Great Sage crumbles, and his crown lands in the water. As the Old Monkey appears again, he'll place the crown upon the Destined One's head and finish the tale of Sun Wukong.
